name: Therese Kopiwoda
text: The food is what I expect from Pizza Hut - thatâ€™s fine. But, I have been there to pick up pizza twice during the pandemic. The first time, the person at the window was not wearing a mask or gloves when she handed me my order. â€¦More

name: Becca B
text: Wow guys. Your breadsticks are flat and undercooked. Nice job trying to make the dough stretch. They are half the size they used to be and virtually no topping. Not coming back!

name: Tirazh Story
text:
I don't really like leaving bad reviews, but unfortunately I am.
The last three times the pizza has made my husband and I sick, the very last time we both had gotten food poisoning. There was a very strange taste on all the pizzas we had ordered, tastes like they're using bad product.

name: Garrison Smith
text: The driver was rude, then when we opened our pizza, it had clearly been mishandled. We called and asked for a replacement, and after some back and forth, the manager said she would replace it, but would need the other pizza back. That's fine, I don't want a pizza I can't eat.

name: Bishop Henderson
text: Went there for some wings and a beer. I get there and the waitress tells me that no one there has a license to serve alcohol. Not even the manager!  I wanted 12 wings and some garlic knots. Asked if I could get half one flavor and half â€¦More

name: C. Wellzie
text: Great customer service on the phone while placing my order.  Very good pizza and super quickly made!  Definitely will be back!  Thanks so much!

name: Natalee New
text: Would never recommend to anyone or come here again. Staff was not friendly and barely spoke. They definitely need more social skills especially since they let us eat the buffet and FAILED to speak up and tell us that the buffet had closed 20 minutes ago. THEN proceeded to take the pizza off the buffet after we started eating.

Second visit was only better because the crust did not have black on it.

text: After 9:30 PM they will not answer their phones and turn off online ordering.  As they are open until 10 PM, this doesn't seem right.  Pizza King appreciates it though - this has happened to us 3 times this year already and Pizza King is the way to go!

name: Mike Daggy
text: Ordered ahead and arrived to a long wait after the initial 20 minutes they told us it would take (at least thirty additional minutes). We were given a perfunctory sorry and cold food. This was my worst experience yet with this chain. We'll â€¦More

name: Holly Lambert
text: Wish I could leave no stars. First they forgot half my order. Then one of my pizzas was not done. The driver said he would be back with a new pizza...been trying to call the store for 2 hours and a busy signal every time! If anyone from the â€¦More

name: Mike Lawton
text: Charged my credit card. They said they said they never received my order. The manager told me Iâ€™d have to file a dispute. Iâ€™ve lived in Pendleton My entire life and order from here once a week. Manager could care less. I will dispute the â€¦More

text: Pizza came on time for carry-out but tasted like it had sat out for awhile. Ordered extra bacon but hardly any was on it.

name: Kay Goins

name: Ashley Young
text: We have given this Pizza Hut multiple chances and this was the last one. Our first experience with them dine in was on a Friday night, ordered a beer and no one over 21 to serve it. Next experience we placed an order at 5:30. A storm popped â€¦More

text: THEY DONT EVEN ANSWER THEIR PHONE!!! I WORKED AT PIZZA HUT AND IT WAS NEVER AS BAD AS THE PENDLETON  ONE

name: Victor Walton
text: No matter what you get you surely will be disappointed. Wings were soggy and chewy bread sticks were super hard. It's hard to make a bad pizza but they figured it out. Awful food deffinetly don't recommend unless you enjoy terrible food.

name: Chelsea8484
text: very rude customer service. They do not keep updated on their website. Don't even know their own deals going on. Lady had the nerve to tell me it wasn't charging my card the right amount because money in the bank was too low. I wouldn't be â€¦More

text: They are getting much better! Compared to a year or two ago major improvement in staff and quality! Keep it up pizza hut.

name: Stephen English
text: This place has been going downhill 4 a long time now. How u out of Pepsi, Sierra mist, and tea. And u sell beer but have no one working old enough to sell it????????????

name: Chad Shick
text: Pizza is usually ok, but the times for carry out are always wrong.  Estimated 20 minutes?......more like 45 to an hour.   Their manager threw in a free 2 liter for the wait, so no worries there.   Speed up the service on carry out and it would be good.

name: Cheryl Lewis

name: tuhoda07
text: I thought that after waiting two years (after having a few bad dining experiences here) it would be better. Well, it's not. I am a very patient person but not when waiting almost an hour for food because they lost the pizza, having to ask â€¦More

name: JR Moore
text: Nice place. Food wasn't as slow or as bad as other reviews.  It is a Pizza Hut after all.  Service was a little slow but they also had only a few people working and doing multiple things.

name: Dalton Collins
text: pizza time *insert spiderman 2 pizza theme here*

name: Sam Davis
text: Terrible experience. The waitress was rude and the pizza came out with what looked like snot on the edges. See the picture in the photos

name: Erica Bennett
text: Never order delivery from here! We gave them 5 chances. Orders were always late, usually cold, mostly wrong. When complaining to management you have to go through a call center and cannot get a hold of the local store. We will never go back.

name: Kerry stennett
text: Fast friendly service. Our server was very good at her job.

name: Kristi Devries
text: Not a fan of this pizza hut.   Service is never that good.  Buffet is always lacking variety.   53rd st one is worth the few minute extra drive.

name: Brian Nelson
text: Watched 3 employees talk to each other while the 4th texted all while I needed a refill. The pizza was not very good. I had already sworn off this pizza Hut but they did some work on the place but no improvement other than cosmetic. It is quicker to drive to the Anderson store. Will not return

name: Ashley
text: Worst Pizza Hut I've ever been to. Took over 5 minutes to just get anyone's attention to get croutons and ranch for the salad bar, bathrooms were dirty and not stocked, and when we walked out (didn't stay to eat) we found our server outside smoking. This all happened at 5:30pm on a Friday....AND WE WERE THE ONLY PEOPLE THERE!!

text: For the 3rd and last time I have tried to come here for lunch there is never pizza on the buffet. Why offer a lunch buffet if you canâ€™t keep pizza on it ready to go!

text: nothing!!  Pizza hut sucks!  Place online offer around noon to be delivered at 5:15. Not so much. Driver just got here...6:15. We tried to call to see what the status was, for hung up on. Called back...No answer. Repeat like 4 times,I told â€¦More

text: I would say worst experience ever. No pizza on buffet only 7 people. Terrible food, dog food would have been more appealing. Not sure what happened but never go here.

text: Very polite smiles ! There good to there customers..

text: New oven has the food looking great, and much faster times on carryout and delivery. Buffet every morning but saturday + wensday evening and some new staff have this pizza hut where it needs to be.
